author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Add vertex resolutions and pulls vs x,y,z positions in tracking DQM, as requested by Tracking POG (@mtosi) to better validate scenarios for Run3 optics choice. 

#### PR validation:

Running 
```bash
runTheMatrix.py -l 11824.0 -t 4 -j 8 
```
the code runs fine and produces the desired output histograms / profiles:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/57934552-40ef7680-78c0-11e9-880f-54e87f760df3.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport
title: Add vertex resolutions and pulls vs x,y,z positions in tracking DQM
